<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; Dispose of the given error without handling it. This operation consumes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; error, and the given LLVMErrorRef value is not usable once this call returns.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; Note: This method &#42;only&#42; needs to be called if the error is not being passed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment"> &#42; to some other consuming operation, e.g. LLVMGetErrorMessage.</span></CodeLine>
